fullText:

 Watch Jessica Vosk and Kelli Barrett Sing a Song From the Upcoming Broadway Musical Beaches 
 
 
 Broadway performances start on March 27 at the Majestic Theatre.
dtliExcerpt: The three actors are perfectly cast and deliver performances that feel both authentic and theatrical, capturing the claustrophobia and mounting tension of being stuck on a malfunctioning mechanical shark.
showScoreExcerpt: The three actors are perfectly cast and deliver performances that feel both authentic and theatrical, capturing the claustrophobia and mounting tension of being stuck on a malfunctioning mechanical shark.

llmScore.reasoning: [ensemble-unanimous] | All 3 models agree: Positive | Claude: The excerpt focuses entirely on praising the casting and performances with strong positive language, but the truncated nature and lack of broader production assessment limits confidence in the overall recommendation strength. | GPT-4o: The review praises the casting and performances, indicating a strong recommendation to see the show. | Gemini: The review highlights the strong performances of the cast, suggesting a positive experience overall. The description of capturing tension further supports a positive assessment.
